item.title: Use VSCode for LaTeX
item.description: In this post, I share a method to give VSCode Overleaf-like capabilities. It requires some time investment, but you can get many paid features of Overleaf for free.

item.title: Use applications with intention
item.description: We couldn’t reach the information we wanted a long time ago. While that’s no longer the case, today, we struggle with different problems: Maintaining focus and discovering critical information in noise and clutter. Here I share some of the tricks I employ to overcome these problems.

item.title: Planning vs Preparation
item.description: Both are important. But the famous quote goes: “Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.”
